about_the_game:
In "Fifth Rite," play as a detective investigating strange occurrences in the city. Face off against a powerful cult leader and their followers, as well as supernatural entities, to save the city from their grasp. With its immersive first-person perspective and psychological horror elements, "Fifth Rite" is an indie game that will challenge your wits and keep you on the edge of your seat. Explore the city, gather clues, and fight for survival as you uncover the dark secrets lurking in the shadows.
Fighting isn't always the answer; sometimes you may have to hide, use your wits, and avoid enemies until you gain the upper hand. With a dark and atmospheric world and challenging gameplay, can you uncover the secrets and save the city?
detailed_description:
In "Fifth Rite," play as a detective investigating strange occurrences in the city. Face off against a powerful cult leader and their followers, as well as supernatural entities, to save the city from their grasp. With its immersive first-person perspective and psychological horror elements, "Fifth Rite" is an indie game that will challenge your wits and keep you on the edge of your seat. Explore the city, gather clues, and fight for survival as you uncover the dark secrets lurking in the shadows.
Fighting isn't always the answer; sometimes you may have to hide, use your wits, and avoid enemies until you gain the upper hand. With a dark and atmospheric world and challenging gameplay, can you uncover the secrets and save the city?
legal_notice: WARNING: IF YOU HAVE A HISTORY OF EPILEPSY OR SEIZURES, CONSULT A DOCTOR BEFORE USE. CERTAIN PATTERNS MAY TRIGGER SEIZURES WITH NO PRIOR HISTORY. BEFORE USING AND FOR MORE DETAILS, SEE IMPORTANT HEALTH AND SAFETY WARNINGS
name: The Fifth Rite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770K AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: In the Fifth Rite, uncover the mystery behind strange occurrences in the city as a detective. Face off against the powerful cult leader and their followers, as well as supernatural entities, to save the city from their grasp.
